name: Pixel bomb! bomb!!
summary: Long time ago, there was a beautiful Queen in Leroy Forest. The Queen was very narcissistic. She dressed up splendid every day and thought she was the fairest woman in the Forest. Every beautiful girl in the kingdom would lose good looks by the Queen's curse. One of the Queen's servants told the Queen, ' Princess Amara is most beautiful of all. She lived in a small kingdom at the edge of Leroy Forest.' The Queen decided to send large elf troops taking amount of delicious food to make Amara fat. You are a warrior selected by empire. Now start saving Princess, and defeating the elves.
